li.label: morphed
li.description: I'm... a cat? No, don't pet me. I do have claws and I will cut you.

li.label: morphed
li.description: Cat? I'm a kitty cat! And I dance dance dance, and I dance dance dance.

li.label: morphed
li.description: The world is too detailed and so bright. I keep cutting myself with these damn claws.

li.label: morphed
li.description: Wow, the world looks so sharp, and these claws are sharp too! Imagine if I could look into all the small places on all fours!

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more fur or claws.

li.label: reverted
li.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying threatening to claw people.

li.label: reverted
li.description: No more claws! Finally, I'll stop accidentally stabbing myself.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.

li.label: Cat face
li.description: Great, a face not even a mother could love.
